org.thymeleaf.templatemode

Class StandardTemplateModeHandlers

  • Object
    • org.thymeleaf.templatemode.StandardTemplateModeHandlers

  • public final class StandardTemplateModeHandlers
extends Object

    Utility class that defines the standard set of ITemplateModeHandler objects.

    Standard template modes are:

    • XML
    • VALIDXML
    • XHTML
    • VALIDXHTML
    • HTML5
    • LEGACYHTML5 (for non XML-formed HTML5 code –needs tag balancing prior to parsing)
    Since:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Daniel Fernández
